item.description:
Hi All, seems a lot of us wanted to attend this AOPA/ASF Seminar in Bedford. This is the night of our usual meeting, but we have changed it to accommodate this event. I expect there will be 200 or so pilots at this meeting. They usually have some good door prizes also :-) (Is Murphy going???? )

Maybe we can meet at the Terminal and drive down to Bedford together. A Drive-Out! Let's see how this will work. Maybe have a late dinner there. It's about 45 minutes from KFIT ( to drive aarrgghh) and the meeting is at 6:00. If we plan on meeting around 4:30 or so, we should be fine. A head count might be good so we don't leave without anyone.

Wrecks in the City
Wrecks in the City When an aircraft goes down in a city or neighborhood, the community interest is often considerable. The media- and in some cases local politicians-get involved. In short, accidents in populated areas have repercussions well beyond the safety of the pilot. Thought about what you'd do in an emergency? We'll look at:

The challenges of urban flight
In-depth case studies, including ATC tapes
This seminar is being held at the CRASH COURSE 2009 Event in Bedford, MA only.

Safety Seminars

Pilots are interested in safety. Safe pilots attend the AOPA Air Safety Foundation's more than 200 free safety seminars it offers every year throughout the United States. Everybody's welcome!
Wings Program... Registration is not required.

March 10, 2009 http://www.aopa.org/a...
Time: 6:00-8:30pm
Wrecks in the City

Bedford, MA

DOUBLETREE HOTEL BOSTON/BEDFORD GLEN
44 MIDDLESEX TURNPIKE
BEDFORD, MA 01730

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: AOPA Air Safety Foundation Meeting in Bedford (not KBED)
